Row.Text: A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in the Capital, and the specific Doge received is random. Each Doge can only be received once. Cost increases per Doge trained.
Create a Menagerie in a City. This Menagerie receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Menagerie.

Activate on an Fleet Commander to grant it 2 free Promotions.
Activated on a Fleet Commander Unit to change its name to "Archangel of the Terror." Units within its Command Radius gain increased Combat Strength.
Creates a Fleet Commander in this City.
